div.p: Multidecadal change in (a) sea surface temperature and sea ice extent; (b) sea surface temperature difference (experiment minus LENS control); (c) sea ice extent difference (experiment minus LENS control) north of 66.5 °N, with a Community Earth System Model (CAM 5.3) control run shown for reference (dotted lines). Gray areas indicate one standard deviation of the 40‐member LENS ensemble.
